services.title: Tenderduty
services.description: Tenderduty is a tool for Tendermint validators that will reliably detect missed blocks and notify using Pagerduty.

services.title: Cosmos account finder
services.description: Helps identify if an account exists on multiple cosmos chains with the same public key.

services.title: p2p-exposed
services.description: Utility for validators to check if node related TCP ports are exposed to the internet. By requesting a specific URL it will perform a reverse port scan of the node and return the results.

services.title: Juno network monitor
services.description: Tool for visualizing the distribution of nodes on the network
